content:
TITLE: Realizando Pagamento Pix via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de payload JSON para realizar um pagamento Pix e resposta do servidor. Suporta diferentes tipos de Pix: dados bancários, chave ou Copia e Cola.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "dadosBancarios": {
    "valor": 1.23,
    "dataPagamento": "2022-10-10",
    "descricao": "Pix dados bancários teste",
    "destinatario": { /* ... */ }
  },
  "chavePix": {
    "valor": 1.23,
    "dataPagamento": "2022-10-10",
    "descricao": "Pix com chave Pix teste",
    "destinatario": { /* ... */ }
  },
  "pixCopiaECola": {
    "valor": 1.23,
    "dataPagamento": "2022-10-10",
    "descricao": "Pix com código Copia e Cola",
    "destinatario": { /* ... */ }
  }
}
```

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "tipoRetorno": "APROVACAO",
  "codigoSolicitacao": "c42f0787-02cb-4b31-827e-459ec9d7ece1",
  "dataPagamento": "2022-03-15",
  "dataOperacao": "2022-03-15"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Realizando Pagamento de Boleto via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de payload JSON para realizar um pagamento de boleto e resposta do servidor. Inclui detalhes do pagamento e status da transação.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "codBarraLinhaDigitavel": "07797000000000000004501008460019310001802680",
  "valorPagar": "26.80",
  "dataPagamento": "2023-08-18",
  "dataVencimento": "2021-07-27",
  "cpfCnpjBeneficiario": "12345678912345"
}
```

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "quantidadeAprovadores": 2,
  "dataAgendamento": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
  "statusPagamento": "EMPROCESSAMENTO",
  "codigoTransacao": "8bbdede4-35db-4ec9-b652-e176841e62c8"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Issuing New Charge Request Payload in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example payload for issuing a new charge (Boleto and/or Pix). It includes details such as the charge amount, due date, payer information, messages, discounts, fines, interest, and accepted payment methods.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "seuNumero": "SN0002",
  "valorNominal": 150.75,
  "dataVencimento": "2023-11-15",
  "numDiasAgenda": 30,
  "pagador": {
    "cpfCnpj": "12345678900",
    "tipoPessoa": "FISICA",
    "nome": "Cliente Exemplo Silva",
    "email": "cliente.exemplo@email.com",
    "ddd": "31",
    "telefone": "998765432",
    "endereco": "Rua Exemplo, 123",
    "numero": "123",
    "complemento": "Apto 101",
    "bairro": "Centro",
    "cidade": "Belo Horizonte",
    "uf": "MG",
    "cep": "30100000"
  },
  "mensagens": {
    "linha1": "Mensagem linha 1",
    "linha2": "Mensagem linha 2"
  },
  "desconto1": {
    "codigoDesconto": "VALORFIXODATAINFORMADA",
    "data": "2023-11-10",
    "taxa": 0,
    "valor": 10.00
  },
  "multa": {
    "codigoMulta": "VALORFIXO",
    "data": "2023-11-16",
    "taxa": 0,
    "valor": 5.00
  },
  "mora": {
    "codigoMora": "TAXAMENSAL",
    "data": "2023-11-16",
    "taxa": 1.00,
    "valor": 0.50
  },
  "formasRecebimento": ["BOLETO", "PIX"]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Realizando Pagamento em Lote via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de payload JSON para realizar um pagamento em lote e resposta do servidor. Permite incluir múltiplos pagamentos em uma única requisição.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "meuIdentificador": "string",
  "pagamentos": [
    { /* ...pagamento... */ },
    { /* ...pagamento... */ }
  ]
}
```

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "idLote": "stringstringstringstring",
  "status": "EMPROCESSAMENTO",
  "meuIdentificador": "Lote de pagamentos referente a despesas do condomínio",
  "qtdePagamentos": 0
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example of Pix Webhook Callback Payload in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Sample payload received by a server configured for Pix webhook notifications. The payload contains transaction details including the end-to-end ID, transaction ID, key, amount, timestamp, payer information, and any refund details.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  {
    "endToEndId": "E12345678202009091221abcdef12345",
    "txid": "cd1fe328c875481285a6f233ae41b662",
    "chave": "a82d0acf-6cad-42a1-b5d4-4165416545646845",
    "valor": "100.00",
    "horario": "2020-09-10T13:03:33.902Z",
    "infoPagador": "Pagamento serviço X",
    "devolucoes": [
      {
        "id": "D123456",
        "rtrId": "D12345678202009111000abcde123456",
        "valor": "10.00",
        "horario": {
          "solicitacao": "2020-09-11T10:00:00.123Z",
          "liquidacao": "2020-09-11T10:00:05.456Z"
        },
        "status": "DEVOLVIDO"
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Requisição HTTP para Obtenção de Token OAuth no Banco Inter
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de requisição HTTP POST para obter um token de acesso às APIs do Banco Inter. A requisição utiliza codificação application/x-www-form-urlencoded e inclui client_id, client_secret, grant_type e scope como parâmetros obrigatórios.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/autenticacao.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: http
CODE:
```
POST /oauth/v2/token HTTP/1.1
Host: cdpj.partners.bancointer.com.br
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

client_id=SEU_CLIENT_ID&client_secret=SEU_CLIENT_SECRET&grant_type=client_credentials&scope=extrato.read boleto-cobranca.read
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Resposta JSON para Autenticação OAuth do Banco Inter
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON bem-sucedida (HTTP 200) para a requisição de token. Contém o access_token necessário para autenticar requisições subsequentes, o tipo do token, tempo de expiração em segundos e escopos concedidos.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/autenticacao.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "access_token": "string",
  "token_type": "string",
  "expires_in": 3600,
  "scope": "string"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Saldo Bancário via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de saldo. Inclui informações sobre saldo disponível, bloqueado, limite e data de referência.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "bloqueadoCheque": 240.25,
  "disponivel": 2850.55,
  "bloqueadoJudicialmente": 510.35,
  "bloqueadoAdministrativo": 510.35,
  "limite": 510.35,
  "dataReferencia": "01/01/2024"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Extrato Bancário via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de extrato bancário. O endpoint retorna um array de transações dentro do período especificado.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "transacoes": [
    { /* ...transação... */ }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Extrato Bancário Detalhado via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de extrato detalhado. Inclui informações de paginação e um array de transações detalhadas.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalPaginas": 1,
  "totalElementos": 0,
  "ultimaPagina": true,
  "primeiraPagina": true,
  "tamanhoPagina": 20,
  "numeroDeElementos": 1,
  "transacoes": [
    { /* ...transação detalhada... */ }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Criando Webhook para Notificações via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de payload JSON para criar um webhook para receber notificações de pagamentos Pix ou boletos.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "webhookUrl": "https://meuwebhook.com/"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Pagamento Pix via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de um pagamento Pix específico. Inclui detalhes da transação e histórico.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "transacaoPix": {
    "contaCorrente": "string",
    "recebedor": { /* ... */ },
    "erros": [ /* ... */ ],
    "endToEnd": "string",
    "valor": 0,
    "status": "string",
    "dataHoraMovimento": "string",
    "dataHoraSolicitacao": "string",
    "chave": "string",
    "codigoSolicitacao": "string"
  },
  "historico": [ { /* ... */ } ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Estrutura do Callback Pix em JSON
DESCRIPTION: Formato do corpo da requisição POST enviada pelo Inter para a URL do webhook Pix configurado. Contém informações sobre a transação Pix, incluindo identificadores, valor, horário e dados opcionais.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/webhooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  {
    "endToEndId": "E...",
    "txid": "...",
    "chave": "...",
    "valor": "...",
    "horario": "...",
    "infoPagador": "...",
    "componentesValor": { ... },
    "devolucoes": [ ... ]
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Estrutura do Callback de Recebimento PIX Banking em JSON
DESCRIPTION: Formato do corpo da requisição POST enviada pelo Inter para a URL do webhook Banking configurado, específico para notificações de recebimentos PIX. Inclui detalhes da transação PIX recebida.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/webhooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "tipoOperacao": "PIX",
  "evento": "RECEBIMENTO",
  "pix": {
    "endToEndId": "E...",
    "txid": "...",
    "valor": 150.00,
    "chave": "...",
    "horario": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ",
    "infoPagador": "..."
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Estrutura do Callback de Cobrança em JSON
DESCRIPTION: Formato do corpo da requisição POST enviada pelo Inter para a URL do webhook de Cobrança configurado. Inclui informações sobre o status da cobrança, valor recebido e detalhes específicos do método de pagamento (boleto ou PIX).
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/webhooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  {
    "codigoSolicitacao": "...",
    "seuNumero": "...",
    "situacao": "RECEBIDO",
    "dataHoraSituacao": "...",
    "valorTotalRecebido": 100.00,
    "origemRecebimento": "BOLETO",
    "nossoNumero": "...",
    "codigoBarras": "...",
    "linhaDigitavel": "...",
    "txid": "...",
    "pixCopiaECola": "..."
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Estrutura do Callback de Pagamento Banking em JSON
DESCRIPTION: Formato do corpo da requisição POST enviada pelo Inter para a URL do webhook Banking configurado, específico para notificações de pagamentos. Inclui tipo de operação, evento, e detalhes do pagamento.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/webhooks.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "tipoOperacao": "PAGAMENTO",
  "evento": "STATUS_ALTERADO",
  "pagamento": {
    "codigoTransacao": "...",
    "status": "PAGO",
    "dataPagamento": "YYYY-MM-DD",
    "horaPagamento": "HH:MM:SS",
    "valorPago": 100.50
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example Pix Payment Callback JSON Structure
DESCRIPTION: This JSON structure represents a callback for a Pix payment. It includes details such as the payment key, request code, transaction timestamps, payment description, and recipient information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "chave": "01123456000123",
  "codigoSolicitacao": "c42f0787-02cb-4b31-827e-459ec9d7ece1",
  "dataHoraMovimento": "2023-09-30T17:34:00.663504",
  "dataHoraSolicitacao": "2023-09-30T17:34:00.527",
  "descricaoPagamento": "Pagamento Pix Teste",
  "endToEnd": "E00416968202309302034aqtneKsYCqs",
  "instituicaoDestinatario": "Banco Inter S.A.",
  "recebedor": { "cpfCnpj": "01123456000123", "nome": "João da Silva" },
  "status": "PROCESSADO",
  "tipoMovimentacao": "PAGAMENTO",
  "valor": "0.01"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Collection of Charges Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for querying a paginated list of charges with filters. It includes details such as total pages, total elements, page size, and an array of charge objects with their respective properties.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalPaginas": 1,
  "totalElementos": 1,
  "tamanhoPagina": 100,
  "primeiraPagina": true,
  "ultimaPagina": true,
  "numeroDeElementos": 1,
  "cobrancas": [
    {
      "codigoSolicitacao": "183e982a-34e5-4bc0-9643-def5432a",
      "seuNumero": "SN12345",
      "dataEmissao": "2023-10-01",
      "dataVencimento": "2023-10-31",
      "valorNominal": 500.00,
      "tipoCobranca": "SIMPLES",
      "situacao": "A_RECEBER",
      "dataSituacao": "2023-10-01",
      "valorTotalRecebido": null,
      "origemRecebimento": null,
      "arquivada": false,
      "boleto": {
        "nossoNumero": "0079...",
        "codigoBarras": "...",
        "linhaDigitavel": "..."
      },
      "pix": {
        "txid": "txid...",
        "pixCopiaECola": "brcode..."
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Detailed Charge Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for querying the complete details of a specific charge by its UUID. It includes all fields of the charge, including payer information, discounts, etc.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "cobranca": {
    "codigoSolicitacao": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890",
    "seuNumero": "SN0002",
    "situacao": "A_RECEBER"
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Resending Callbacks for Inter API Webhooks
DESCRIPTION: This endpoint allows resending callbacks for different webhook types. It accepts a POST request with a JSON payload containing transaction codes for Pix payments and boleto payments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "pix-pagamento": { "codigoSolicitacao": ["uuid1", "uuid2"] },
  "boleto-pagamento": { "codigoTransacao": ["uuid1", "uuid2"] }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Lote de Pagamentos via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de informações de um lote de pagamentos. Inclui detalhes do lote e dos pagamentos individuais.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "contaCorrente": "string",
  "dataCriacao": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  "pagamentos": [ { /* ...pagamento... */ } ],
  "idLote": "stringstringstringstring",
  "status": "EMPROCESSAMENTO",
  "meuIdentificador": "Lote de pagamentos referente a despesas do condomínio",
  "qtdePagamentos": 0
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Exportando Extrato Bancário em PDF via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a exportação de extrato em PDF. O endpoint retorna o conteúdo do PDF codificado em base64.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "pdf": "<base64 do PDF>"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: POST Request for Location Creation
DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to create a new location for QR code generation. Requires payloadlocation.write scope and billing type specification.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
POST /loc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: PUT Request for Batch Billing Creation/Update
DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to create or modify a batch of due date billings. Requires lotecobv.write scope and accepts batch description and billing list.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
PUT /lotecobv/{id}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Realizando Pagamento de DARF via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de payload JSON para realizar um pagamento de DARF e resposta do servidor. Inclui detalhes do pagamento e informações de autenticação.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "cnpjCpf": "90022400664",
  "codigoReceita": "0220",
  "dataVencimento": "2022-01-30",
  "descricao": "Pagamento DARF Janeiro",
  "nomeEmpresa": "Minha Empresa",
  "telefoneEmpresa": "031999911111",
  "periodoApuracao": "2020-01-31",
  "valorPrincipal": 47.14,
  "valorMulta": 27.48,
  "valorJuros": 10.11,
  "referencia": "13609400849201739"
}
```

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "quantidadeAprovadores": 4,
  "autenticacao": "12345678910433",
  "dataPagamento": "23/01/2022",
  "tipoRetorno": "PAGAMENTO",
  "codigoSolicitacao": "8bbdede4-35db-4ec9-b652-e176841e62c8"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Pagamentos de Boletos via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de pagamentos realizados. Retorna um array com detalhes de cada pagamento.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  {
    "codigoTransacao": "3414f226-36fb-4d87-811e-cfd99911d845",
    "codigoBarra": "23791908400000545...",
    "tipo": "Pagamento Xpto",
    "dataVencimentoDigitada": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "dataVencimentoTitulo": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "dataInclusao": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "dataPagamento": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "valorPago": 85.9,
    "valorNominal": 85.9,
    "statusPagamento": "EMPROCESSAMENTO",
    "aprovacoesNecessarias": 2,
    "aprovacoesRealizadas": 2,
    "cpfCnpjBeneficiario": "123456789-01",
    "nomeBeneficiario": "João 123",
    "autenticacao": "...",
    "nsu": "82127399"
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Canceling Charge Request Payload in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example payload for requesting the cancellation of a charge that hasn't been paid yet. It includes the reason for cancellation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "motivoCancelamento": "CLIENTE_DESISTIU"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Canceling Charge Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for successfully requesting the cancellation of a charge. The cancellation process is asynchronous, and the response includes a status and a message.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "status": "PROCESSANDO",
  "mensagem": "Cancelamento solicitado"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Issuing New Charge Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for successfully issuing a new charge. It returns the UUID of the created charge.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "codigoSolicitacao": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Editing Charge Request Payload in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example payload for modifying an existing charge. In this case, it's changing the due date and nominal value of the charge.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "dataVencimento": "2023-11-30",
  "valorNominal": 160.00
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Editing Charge Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for successfully requesting an edit to an existing charge. The edit process is asynchronous, and the response includes a status and an edit code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "status": "PROCESSANDO",
  "mensagem": "Edição solicitada",
  "codigoEdicao": "uuid-da-edicao"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Consultando Pagamentos de DARF via API REST (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: Exemplo de resposta JSON para a consulta de pagamentos de DARF realizados. Retorna um array com detalhes de cada pagamento de DARF.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/banking.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  {
    "codigoSolicitacao": "3414f226-36fb-4d87-811e-cfd99911d845",
    "tipoDarf": "PRETO",
    "valor": 50.96,
    "valorMulta": 0,
    "valorJuros": 0,
    "valorTotal": 50.96,
    "tipo": "Darf",
    "periodoApuracao": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "dataPagamento": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "referencia": "424562562565",
    "dataVencimento": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "codigoReceita": "190",
    "statusPagamento": "EMPROCESSAMENTO",
    "dataInclusao": "2019-10-10 13:00:00",
    "cnpjCpf": "84668147010",
    "aprovacoesNecessarias": 4,
    "aprovacoesRealizadas": 2
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: GET Request for Due Date Billing List
DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to query a paginated list of due date billings (CobV) with filters. Requires OAuth scope cobv.read and has rate limits of 120/min in production.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
GET /cobv
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: PATCH Request for Batch Billing Revision
DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to revise specific billings within an existing batch. Accepts partial updates to batch description and billing subset.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
PATCH /lotecobv/{id}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: DELETE Request for Location Unbinding
DESCRIPTION: Endpoint to remove billing association from a location. Allows location reuse after unbinding.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
DELETE /loc/{id}/txid
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: POST Request for Due Date Billing Payment (Sandbox)
DESCRIPTION: Sandbox-only endpoint to simulate payment of a due date billing. Requires pix.write scope and accepts payment amount in request body.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/pix.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: HTTP
CODE:
```
POST /cobv/pagar/{txid}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Charge Summary Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example response for querying a summary of charges. It returns a quantitative and financial summary of charges by situation, based on applied filters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  { "situacao": "A_RECEBER", "valor": 15000.50, "quantidade": 10 },
  { "situacao": "RECEBIDO", "valor": 8500.00, "quantidade": 5 },
  { "situacao": "ATRASADO", "valor": 3200.00, "quantidade": 2 }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Common Error Response in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Example of a common error response format used by the API. It includes a title, detailed description, and optional violations for validation errors.
SOURCE: https://github.com/jeanmrx1/inter-api-docs/blob/main/docs/cobranca.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "title": "Título do Erro",
  "detail": "Descrição detalhada do erro.",
  "violacoes": [
    {
      "razao": "Mensagem da violação.",
      "propriedade": "nomeDoCampoComErro"
    }
  ]
}
```
